questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happened?

answers.answer: The sun is shining and is warming my heart. The blue sky is smiling me to bring dream. The light and cool wind is rocking me like a child. The birds are singing to tell the aperitf time with a lot of friends. It is a simple moment of peace and sharing. A soft wave of frienship is dancing in my heart and my soul. I m happy
